title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Suggested Reading
body: The Nez Perce and 1877 - Suggested Reading       Suggested Reading  The National Park Service has commissioned special studies on particular aspects of 1877. These studies are available below in a digital format. Forlorn Hope: A Study of the Battle of White Bird Canyon and the Beginning of the Nez Perce Indian War  Nez Perce Summer: The U.S. Army and the Nee-Me-Poo Crisis  A Sharp Little Affair: The Archeology of the Big Hole Battlefield The Nez Perce National Historic Trail has an extensive bibliography that is useful for finding resources related to 1877. The park also has several books on 1877 and its aftermath that can also be purchased through our bookstore.
